hero.badge: From search to download, all in one place
hero.title: COPYDRUM Search & Purchase Guide
hero.description:
Find your desired drum sheet music quickly, purchase reasonably,
and download without any issues—all methods gathered in one place.
Check out the essential tips for efficient practice, from new users to existing members.

firstPurchase.title: First Purchase in 3 Minutes
firstPurchase.description: A quick summary for first-time visitors. Follow the steps below to complete your first sheet music purchase right away.

account.title: 1 min – Create Account
account.detail: Quickly create an account through sign-up or social login.
account.highlight: After login, cart and download menus will be activated.

findSheet.title: 1 min – Find Sheet Music
findSheet.detail: Enter the song title or artist name in the search box and select the sheet music you like.

payment.title: 1 min – Payment & Download
payment.detail: Add to cart, complete payment, and you can download the PDF sheet music immediately.

effectiveSearch.title: Search Sheet Music Effectively
effectiveSearch.description: If search results are too many or you can't find the song you want, try adjusting your search more precisely with the following methods.

keyword.title: Keyword Combination
keyword.detail: Combining two or more words like song title + artist increases accuracy.

filter.title: Narrow with Filters
filter.detail: Select genre, price range, and difficulty level on the category page to filter only the sheet music you need.

noResults.title: No Results Handling
noResults.detail: Check spelling and try searching again with similar keywords.

chooseSheet.title: Choose the Right Sheet Music for You
chooseSheet.description: Compare difficulty level, arrangement style, and sheet music composition to select sheet music that matches your practice goals.

difficulty.title: Check Difficulty
difficulty.detail: Divided into beginner/intermediate/advanced, and you can check the required techniques in the detailed description.
difficulty.highlight: Beginner: Basic patterns, Intermediate: Includes fills, Advanced: Emphasizes speed and technique

preview.title: Use Preview
preview.detail: Check if it's the style you want through sample pages and demo videos.

price.title: Compare Prices
price.detail: You can make a more reasonable choice by comparing individual sheets, collections, and event sheets together.

purchaseProcess.title: Complete Purchase Process Guide
purchaseProcess.description: Step-by-step guide to proceed without mistakes from cart to payment completion.

cart.title: Add to Cart
cart.detail: Click the cart button on the sheet music detail page to pay for multiple sheets at once.
cart.highlight: Promotion code can be entered at the top of the cart

paymentInfo.title: Check Payment Information
paymentInfo.detail: Be sure to check order details, discount application, and terms of service before payment.

paymentMethod.title: Select Payment Method
paymentMethod.detail: Supports credit card, bank transfer, Kakao Pay, etc., and a notification email will be sent after payment completion.

download.title: Download Sheet Music
download.description: Purchased sheet music can be downloaded immediately as PDF and can be downloaded again anytime.

immediate.title: Immediate Download
immediate.detail: You can download the PDF file immediately from the purchase completion page right after purchase.

redownload.title: Re-download from My Page
redownload.detail: You can re-download already purchased sheet music from the purchase history in My Page.
redownload.highlight: Purchased sheet music can be re-downloaded without limit.

pdf.title: Use PDF
pdf.detail: Provided as high-quality PDF files, you can practice directly on tablets or laptops, or print in your desired size.

discounts.title: Maximize Discounts and Benefits
discounts.description: Create a richer practice environment by utilizing special event sales, sheet cash recharge bonuses, and custom order services.

event.title: Event Sheets
event.detail: Check out sheet music offered at 100 won or discounted prices for a limited time in the special sale section.
event.highlight: Event sheets are limited quantity/period, so check quickly!

cash.title: Sheet Cash Recharge
cash.detail: Additional bonuses are provided according to the recharge amount. If you plan to make bulk purchases, recharge in advance.

customOrder.title: Compare Custom Orders
customOrder.detail: If you can't find the sheet music you're looking for, you can get an accurate arrangement through custom orders. Choose according to your budget and schedule.

keyword.title: Recommended Keywords
keyword.description: Searching with song title + artist increases accuracy.

filter.title: Filter Combination
filter.description: Setting genre + difficulty + price range together leaves only the sheet music you need.

noResults.title: No Search Results
noResults.description: Check spelling again or search with similar genre/artist and then try custom orders.

regular.title: Regular Purchase
items: Wide selection of genres and difficulty levels

items: Produce exactly the song and arrangement style you want

helpNeeded.title: Need More Help?
helpNeeded.description: Check frequently asked questions in customer support or request direct consultation through inquiry.

terms.title: Terms of Service
content: All customers using COPYDRUM services must respect copyright and use sheet music within the scope of personal practice purposes. Unauthorized distribution, reproduction, or sharing of purchased sheet music is subject to legal sanctions, and a separate license is required for commercial use.

Since downloads are provided immediately after payment, refunds may be limited after download completion due to the nature of digital content. Detailed policies related to service use, including payments, custom orders, and event benefits, are updated regularly through customer service announcements.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy Summary
content: We collect minimal personal information such as email, name, and payment information for account registration, order processing, and customer support. This information is securely stored in a Supabase-based security environment. We do not use personal information for purposes other than providing services, and we strictly comply with prior consent procedures when sharing with third parties.

Customers can request to view, modify, or delete their personal information through the My Page or Customer Support, and such requests will be processed without delay. For inquiries regarding personal information protection, please contact us through Customer Support 1:1 inquiry or email.
